item.title: Dockerfile writing best practices
item.description: I’ve been thinking for a long time about writing set of articles on the topic of: “Dockerfile writing best practices”. As it’s often my daily job to prepare best in class containers, that are later used by thousands of company’s applications, I have quite good insights on the topic. Some experience and knowledge gathered is often against intuition and building it took me a while. I want to share it, with a hope that feedback I get will allow me to excel on the topic even further.
